name: Hexagon Defense
description: Welcome to the career officer, and was promoted to Admiral! This is an unusual, dynamic Tower Defense, a lot of levels. The towers have a different shooting mode, and the enemies of a different color. You will have time to repair the tower and improve them. Beware the mini-bosses! Earn medals. Good luck!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7 Processor: Processor 1.2 Ghz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
